snippet: Thomas E. Duncan, the Liberian who developed Ebola symptoms after arriving in Dallas, lied about his history of contact with the disease on a questionnaire, an official said.

byline.original: By NORIMITSU ONISHI and MARC SANTORA

lead_paragraph: Thomas E. Duncan, the Liberian who developed Ebola symptoms after arriving in Dallas, lied about his history of contact with the disease on a questionnaire, an official said.

headline.main: Ebola Patient in Dallas Lied on Screening Form, Liberian Airport Official Says
